## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                                                                                      | Type                                                    | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `breakpoint` | `breakpoint` | Controls at which breakpoint the mobile menu (go-nav-drawer) becomes main nav menu (go-main-nav) | `"all" \| "desktop" \| "large" \| "mobile" \| "tablet"` | `'desktop'` |
